boundary.title: Something went wrong
boundary.message: The application encountered an unexpected error. Please try again.

system.title: System Error
system.timeoutTip: Tip: If you recently installed a new distribution, close any terminal windows that were automatically opened during installation.
system.forceShutdownMessage: This will forcibly terminate all WSL processes using 'wsl --shutdown --force'. Any unsaved work in your Linux distributions may be lost. This action cannot be undone.
